title: Cover a Court Trial
description: A reporter is assigned to cover a high-profile criminal trial and must provide daily updates.

tasks.description: Obtain the court docket to understand the day's schedule and witnesses.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent knows the plan for the day's proceedings.

tasks.description: Attend the trial and take detailed notes of testimony and arguments.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent captures the key events of the trial.

tasks.description: During breaks, file short updates to the newsroom's live blog.
tasks.expected_outcome: The online audience receives timely updates from the courtroom.

tasks.description: At the end of the day, write a summary article of the day's proceedings.
tasks.expected_outcome: A comprehensive summary article is produced.
